DOC.brief_summary: The effects of tai chi exercise and lower-extremity training on improving the primary outcome and secondary outcomes among older people will be compared.
DOC.brief_title: Tai Chi Exercise in Older People
DOC.criteria: Persons aged 60 years and older and who require medical attention in the emergency rooms due to sustaining a fall. A major unstable cardiopulmonary disease Cognitive impairment Contraindications to physical exercise The inability to ambulate Frail elderly.
